channel.title: 3 Some What unknown Programs On Your Computer
channel.description:
[center][b][u]Long Way[/u][/b][/center]
ok first off i would like to say Some What unknown cuz there not really unknown but a few people don't know about them, i was also bored, and i dident really know how to name this topic but anyway lets get to it.
OK, first Find [img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/9995/mycomptg0.png[/img] on your [b]Desktop[/b] or under [img]http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/117/startbuttonrp8.png[/img]
click on and open [img]http://img297.imageshack.us/img297/9995/mycomptg0.png[/img] then click on [img]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/2481/cdrivexb9.png[/img]
after that click on [img]http://img328.imageshack.us/img328/8705/docsnsettingyo5.png[/img] after you click that find the username you are logged in on (the username you login on when you first startup the computer)
after that is done click on [img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/8819/startmenukf5.png[/img] then on [img]http://img208.imageshack.us/img208/4111/programsmr9.png[/img] now click [img]http://img171.imageshack.us/img171/9241/accessoriestk2.png[/img]
Now click [img]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/6024/accessibilityud8.png[/img] we found the 2 programs
[center][b][u]Short Way[/u][/b][/center] Click On [img]http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/117/startbuttonrp8.png[/img] then click [img]http://img176.imageshack.us/img176/213/allprogramsrd4.png[/img] then [img]http://img134.imageshack.us/img134/360/startaccessorieskk1.png[/img] then [img]http://img201.imageshack.us/img201/5189/startaccessibilitygn6.png[/img] we found them... http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?action=post;board=43.0 Start new topic
[center][b][u]Super-Short Way[/u][/b][/center] Click [img]http://img182.imageshack.us/img182/117/startbuttonrp8.png[/img] then [img]http://img145.imageshack.us/img145/5305/startrungs6.png[/img] then in the "Open" box ([img]http://img224.imageshack.us/img224/7746/runopenfq3.png[/img]) put this
[code]C:\Documents and Settings\USERNAMEHERE\Start Menu\Programs\Accessories\Accessibility[/code]
in the "USERNAMEHERE" spot put the account you are currently logged in on the computer.
[center][b][u]What They All Mean[/u][/b][/center] [center]Now To Explain What Each One Means[/center]
[img]http://img224.imageshack.us/img224/3263/magnifierah7.png[/img] - [img]http://img221.imageshack.us/img221/5620/magnifierinfoku5.png[/img] [img]http://img247.imageshack.us/img247/6122/magnifiersettsui3.png[/img] basically it puts a little strip on the top of your screen and where ever you put your mouse is where is magnifies
[size=10pt][b]~ ~ ~[/b][/size]
[img]http://img174.imageshack.us/img174/53/narratorex7.png[/img] - [img]http://img225.imageshack.us/img225/3307/narratorinfolj6.png[/img] [img]http://img152.imageshack.us/img152/6418/narratorsettstv6.png[/img]
[size=10pt][b]~ ~ ~[/b][/size]
[img]http://img329.imageshack.us/img329/3237/oskzt0.png[/img] - [img]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/2231/oskinfole3.png[/img] [img]http://img299.imageshack.us/img299/3841/oskyd7.png[/img]
yes i realize its not much but i was kinda bored, enjoy.
[center]MADE BY MVP566//DYLAN//RS2ARMOR.COM//RS2ARMOR.ORG//RS2WORLDSWITCHER.NET[/center]

item.title: 3 Some What unknown Programs On Your Computer
item.dc:creator: @Ron Ron
item.description:
@Ron wrote:

Yep I know about these too. Not helpful, because this is pretty much a computer forum cause it’s all about using programs to cheat on rs and what not. People know a lot about computers here compared to some other forums. This tutorial would belong on those other forums.

@bloodrayne wrote:

yakman:

yeah i knew about these, i once used onscreen keyboard when my real one stopped working (remote, ran out of batterys)

Dam…I hate using the on screen keyboard. Takes me so long to move my mouse… BACK AND FORTH AND BACK AND FORTH.
